ml_tags: Proverbs 31:28 - The Capable Wife "Her children rise up and call her blessed; Her husband also, and he praises her" Rest In Eternal Peace Born 28 November 1964 Died 29 September 2021 A natural sports talent A leader and mentor to many Enterprising and industrious A soul full of sweetness Devoted Mother to Chris, Colin & CJ Dedicated Wife to Charles A vibrant personality full of life The leading light of her Siblings Her Parents pillar of strength Her spirit will live on forever Kunemo Rupa Amini In Loving Memory Of
